title: Adoption Animation Bug #3 Fix
details:
Bug #3: Animation Playing for All Quick Tabs During Single Adoption

Root Cause: handleAdoptionCompletion() called scheduleRender() which triggers full UI rebuild. _renderUIImmediate() destroys all DOM via containersList.innerHTML = '', causing all Quick Tab items to be re-created, triggering CSS animations on all items.

Solution: Implemented surgical DOM updates for adoption events:
1. _performSurgicalAdoptionUpdate() for targeted DOM manipulation
2. _moveQuickTabBetweenGroups() for cross-group moves without re-render
3. Only the adopted Quick Tab gets .adoption-animation class
4. CSS animation removed from automatic trigger on all items

Key files:
- sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js: Added surgical update functions
- sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.css: Added .adoption-animation class, removed auto-animation

Pattern: When making targeted state changes, prefer surgical DOM updates over full re-renders to prevent unintended animations and improve performance.
